name: OklahomaLottery
0:
”Alexa, open Oklahoma Lottery”
”Alexa, ask Oklahoma Lottery what are the Power Ball Numbers?”
”Alexa, ask Oklahoma Lottery what is the Mega Million's Jackpot Amount?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oklahoma lottery
des: Use this app to get the latest winning numbers and jackpot information for Powerball®, Mega Millions®, Hot Lotto®, Cash 5® and Pick 3®. Just tell Alexa, "Ask Oklahoma Lottery what the latest powerball numbers are".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
